attributes.action: revise the effectiveness of the harrier aircraft, rather tthan scrap it for the F-22
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The harrier aircraft, has the ability to sustainably fly very low, this makes radar's struggle to track it. the fire power of the harrier, is still to be matched. This stealthy aircraft is able to attack target's without being heard or seen on radar, till it has attacked the target. The harrier's extremely low flight makes it extremely hard to attack. The harrier has the ability too sneak up on emery's and provide formidable attack capability.
